data.actual_result: Server options do not dismiss itself when the notification tells the app to go to a different server/channel or DM.
data.expected_result: Server options should automatically dismiss itself when moving away from associated server.
data.short_description: Server options do not disappear when going to home screen and re-open from a notification.
data.steps_to_repro: - On any server, open server options. (Three dot menu alongside server name) - While server options are open, go to home screen. - On home screen, open any Discord notification that goes to a different server or DM. - Observe.
